At this appointment the 
type of care you will have 
during your pregnancy will be 
discussed and decided.
• If all is well with your 
pregnancy you will have 
the majority of your 
appointments with your 
midwife in the community, 
usually close to where you 
live.
• If there are complications 
with your pregnancy (either
